title: Dashboard
text: The Dashboard is an overview of how the company is performing, shown in the form of graphs and key performance figures. From the Date Filter and Shop Selection filter, you can break down the overview into specific periods and by the individual shop. Key Performance Figures Graphs Total Revenue by Hour Excluding Vat. Total Number of Sales by Hour. Top Sellers by Revenue. Top Sellers by Quantity. Average Transaction Value by Hour. Top right of some graphs is a corresponding summary value. NOTE: There is no print option for the Dashboard reports.
description:
The Dashboard is an overview of how the company is performing, shown in the form of graphs and key performance figures.

From the Date Filter and Shop Selection filter, you can break down the overview into specific periods and by the individual shop.

Key Performance Figures


 

Graphs

  • Total Revenue by Hour Excluding Vat. 
  • Total Number of Sales by Hour.
  • Top Sellers by Revenue.
  • Top Sellers by Quantity.
  • Average Transaction Value by Hour.
  • Top right of some graphs is a corresponding summary value. 


NOTE:  There is no print option for the Dashboard reports.

title: Store Sale Summary
text: The Store Sale Summary report offers a comprehensive overview of the company's sales performance. The report can be presented in two formats: a Table displaying figures and Graphs illustrating trends. By utilizing the Date Picker and Shop Selection filters, you can analyze sales figures for specific periods and individual shops. This allows for a more detailed breakdown of the sales data. Furthermore, the report provides additional filter options that enable you to customize the view. You can add or remove columns based on your preferences and adjust the Summary Boxes to display the desired information. Please note that the data in the report excludes Gift Certificates or Expenses, focusing solely on sales-related information.
description:
The Store Sale Summary report offers a comprehensive overview of the company's sales performance. The report can be presented in two formats: a Table displaying figures and Graphs illustrating trends.


By utilizing the Date Picker and Shop Selection filters, you can analyze sales figures for specific periods and individual shops. This allows for a more detailed breakdown of the sales data.


Furthermore, the report provides additional filter options that enable you to customize the view. You can add or remove columns based on your preferences and adjust the Summary Boxes to display the desired information.


Please note that the data in the report excludes Gift Certificates or Expenses, focusing solely on sales-related information.

title: Financial Summary
text: The Financial Summary report offers a comprehensive analysis of the company's performance from a financial perspective. It provides detailed information regarding financial data. Using the Date Picker and Shop Selection filter, you can narrow down the report to specific periods and individual shops, allowing for a more focused analysis of the financial data. Please note that the Dashboard reports, including the Financial Summary report, do not have a print option. They are designed to be viewed and analyzed within the system, without the ability to generate physical printouts. Key Performance Figures Total Sales Average Basket Amount Average Basket Number of Items Financial Data Summary: List of Report Fields Transaction Analysis Description Number of Transactions Number of items Amount. Discount Analysis Description Number of Transactions Original Amount Discounted Amount Discount Discount Reason Code Analysis Description Number of Transactions Original Amount Discounted Amount Discount Return Analysis Description Number of items Value Cash Statement for Connector Description Currency Code Amount Payment Methods Description Number of Transactions Total Tax Analysis Description Net Amount Tax Amount Total Time Analysis Graph Additional Financial data is shown on the Time Analysis graph if you hover the pointer/mouse over the data points.
description:

title: Clerk Sale Summary
text: The Clerk Sale Summary report focuses on providing sales performance information based on individual clerks and their respective sales transactions. The report offers two presentation options: a Data Table displaying figures and Graphs for visual representation. By utilizing the Date Picker and Shop Selection filters, you can narrow down the sales figures to specific periods and individual shops, enabling a more detailed analysis of the sales data specific to each clerk. Moreover, the report provides additional filter options that allow you to customize the view. You can add or remove columns based on your preferences and modify the Summary Boxes to display the desired information related to clerk sales performance.
description:
The Clerk Sale Summary report focuses on providing sales performance information based on individual clerks and their respective sales transactions. The report offers two presentation options: a Data Table displaying figures and Graphs for visual representation.


By utilizing the Date Picker and Shop Selection filters, you can narrow down the sales figures to specific periods and individual shops, enabling a more detailed analysis of the sales data specific to each clerk.


Moreover, the report provides additional filter options that allow you to customize the view. You can add or remove columns based on your preferences and modify the Summary Boxes to display the desired information related to clerk sales performance.

title: Master Item Summary Sale
text: The Master Item Sale Summary report offers a detailed analysis of the company's performance from a Master Item perspective. The report is presented as a Data Table, providing comprehensive figures and information. Using the Date Picker and Shop Selection filters, you can segment the sales figures based on specific periods and individual shops. This allows for a more granular breakdown of the sales data related to each Master Item. Additionally, the report provides further filter options that give you the flexibility to customize the view. You can add or remove columns according to your preferences and adjust the Summary Boxes to display the desired information related to Master Item sales performance.

title: Item Sale Summary
text: The Item Sale Summary report provides a detailed analysis of the company's performance specifically related to Variant Items. The report is presented as a Data Table, offering comprehensive figures and information. By utilizing the Date Picker and Shop Selection filters, you can segment the sales figures based on specific periods and individual shops. This allows for a more focused breakdown of the sales data related to each Variant Item. Furthermore, the report provides additional filter options that allow you to customize the view according to your preferences. You can add or remove columns based on the desired information and adjust the Summary Boxes to display the specific metrics or summaries that are relevant to Variant Item sales performance.

title: Vendor Sale Summary
text: The Vendor Sale Summary report offers detailed insights into the company's performance from a Vendor perspective. The report can be presented as a Data Table containing figures and also as Graphs for visual representation. By using the Date Picker and Shop Selection filters, you can analyze the sales figures for specific periods and individual shops, allowing for a detailed breakdown of Vendor-related sales data. Additionally, the report provides additional filter options to customize the view. You can add or remove columns based on your preferences and modify the Summary Boxes to display specific metrics or summaries relevant to Vendor sales performance. This flexibility allows you to tailor the report to your specific needs and gain a deeper understanding of how the company is performing with different Vendors.

title: Customer Sale Summary
text: The Customer Sale Summary report provides a table view that showcases the customer's non-Account Sales, Account Sales, and Points status. It offers insights into the customer's purchasing behaviour and loyalty program engagement. By utilizing the Date Picker and Shop Selection filters, you can segment the sales figures based on specific periods and individual shops. This allows for a more detailed breakdown of the sales data related to each customer. Furthermore, the report offers additional filter options, giving you the flexibility to customize the view according to your preferences. You can add or remove columns based on the desired information and adjust the Summary Boxes to display specific metrics or summaries relevant to customer sales and loyalty program performance.
description:
The Customer Sale Summary report provides a table view that showcases the customer's non-Account Sales, Account Sales, and Points status. It offers insights into the customer's purchasing behaviour and loyalty program engagement.


By utilizing the Date Picker and Shop Selection filters, you can segment the sales figures based on specific periods and individual shops. This allows for a more detailed breakdown of the sales data related to each customer.


Furthermore, the report offers additional filter options, giving you the flexibility to customize the view according to your preferences. You can add or remove columns based on the desired information and adjust the Summary Boxes to display specific metrics or summaries relevant to customer sales and loyalty program performance.

title: Footfall Summary
text: The Footfall Summary report offers detailed information on conversion rates for a shop, specifically comparing sales and revenue to the number of customers entering and exiting the shop. The report provides both Graphs and a Data Table for visual and numerical analysis. By utilizing the Date Picker and Shop Selection filters, you can break down the footfall figures into specific time periods, individual shops, and even by clerks if desired. This allows for a more comprehensive analysis of conversion rates based on various factors. Additionally, the report provides additional filter options that allow you to customize the view according to your preferences. You can add or remove columns to focus on specific metrics or information that is relevant to your analysis. This flexibility enables a more tailored and insightful examination of footfall and conversion rates for your shops.
description:
The Footfall Summary report offers detailed information on conversion rates for a shop, specifically comparing sales and revenue to the number of customers entering and exiting the shop. The report provides both Graphs and a Data Table for visual and numerical analysis.


By utilizing the Date Picker and Shop Selection filters, you can break down the footfall figures into specific time periods, individual shops, and even by clerks if desired. This allows for a more comprehensive analysis of conversion rates based on various factors.


Additionally, the report provides additional filter options that allow you to customize the view according to your preferences. You can add or remove columns to focus on specific metrics or information that is relevant to your analysis. This flexibility enables a more tailored and insightful examination of footfall and conversion rates for your shops.

title: Store Sale Report
text: The Store Sale Report provides figures that allow for a comparison of store performance using various metrics. One of the metrics available for comparison is the Square Metres of each shop. You have the option to include or exclude this metric based on your needs for a relative comparison. To activate or deactivate the Square Metres metric, you can use the toggle located on the right-hand side of the report. By including or excluding Square Metres, you can gain insights into the performance of stores while considering their respective sizes. This feature helps provide a more accurate and fair comparison among stores in the report.

By including or excluding Square Metres, you can gain insights into the performance of stores while considering their respective sizes. This feature helps provide a more accurate and fair comparison among stores in the report.
